description.text: You move as swiftly and unpredictably as a flickering flame.

sections.Benefit: While using Perfect Style, you can use your Wisdom modifier in place of your Charisma modifier when attempting Bluff checks to feint. You can spend 1 ki point as a swift action to gain the benefits of Improved Feint for 1 round.
sections.Note: Note If using the optional Stamina Pool rules, the following trick may be used with this feat.
